long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Address Finder for Rightmove finds the complete property address, including flat/house number and postcode, for all the listings on Rightmove.

== Changelog ==
- Version 1.0.7 (2024-11-26): Updated the plugin to reflect new changes to Rightmove. The plugin now works again.
- Version 1.0.5 (2024-11-01): Fixed a problem where addresses have not been rendered correctly.
- Version 1.0.0 (2024-07-14): Initial release.

== How to use ==
Install the extension, and addresses will appear in the listings automatically.

== How it works ==
Our plugin uses historical sale data to find accurate addresses. If a property hasn't been sold recently, the address may not be found. You'll see the complete address right on listing pages and individual property pages saving you time and effort.

== Contact ==
Have any questions, suggestions, or just want to say hi? Shoot me an email at bart65692@gmail.com. I'd love to hear from you!
